#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  // Log_info("PUT: value is %s with oid %d on server %d (leader: %d)", v.c_str(), oid, GetRaftServer().loc_id_, GetRaftServer().state == ServerState::Leader);

  uint64_t cmdIndex, leaderTerm;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool startAgreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &cmdIndex, &leaderTerm);
  if (!startAgreement) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->Wait(OPERATION_TIMEOUT);
  if (this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE) {
    shared_ptr<IntEvent> waitForCommit = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    waitForCommit->Wait(WAIT_FOR_COMMIT);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  uint64_t cmdIndex, leaderTerm;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool startAgreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &cmdIndex, &leaderTerm);
  if (!startAgreement) {
    // Log_info("server %d not leader, state is candidate (%d); follower (%d)", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, GetRaftServer().state == ServerState::Candidate, GetRaftServer().state == ServerState::Follower);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // if (GetRaftServer().IsDisconnected()) {
  //   Log_info("leader %d is disconnected", GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  // }
  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->Wait(OPERATION_TIMEOUT);
  if (this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE) {
    shared_ptr<IntEvent> waitForCommit = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    waitForCommit->Wait(WAIT_FOR_COMMIT);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(*v);
  // Log_info("GET: with oid %d on server %d (leader: %d)", oid, GetRaftServer().loc_id_, GetRaftServer().state == ServerState::Leader);



  uint64_t cmdIndex, leaderTerm;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool startAgreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &cmdIndex, &leaderTerm);
  if (!startAgreement) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->Wait(OPERATION_TIMEOUT);
  if (this->eventMap[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE) {
    if (keyValueStore.find(k) != keyValueStore.end()) {
      *v = keyValueStore[k];
      // Log_info("GET: returning value %s", keyValueStore[k].c_str());
    } else {
      *v = "";
    }
    shared_ptr<IntEvent> waitForCommit = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    waitForCommit->Wait(WAIT_FOR_COMMIT);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  string oid = v->data_[0];
  string operation = v->data_[1];
  string k = v->data_[2];
  string val = v->data_[3];

  if (operation == "put") {
    // Log_info("OnNextCommand: put value %s with oid %s on server %d", val.c_str(), oid.c_str(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
    keyValueStore[k] = val;
  } else if (operation == "append") {
    // Log_info("OnNextCommand: append value %s to current value %s with oid %s on server %d", val.c_str(), keyValueStore[k].c_str(), oid.c_str(), GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
    if (keyValueStore.find(k) == keyValueStore.end()) {
      keyValueStore[k] = val;
    } else {
      keyValueStore[k] += val;
    }
  }

  if (this->eventMap.find(oid) != this->eventMap.end()) {
    this->eventMap[oid]->Set(1);
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
